ARGUMENT.P:
Raw transcription from two MSS, arranged in line pairs.
Upper line: London, BL, Sloane 3486, f. 147v. "A physician behooveth to know three manner inspections in bloodletting that is to say ... " VK 0659.00; eVK2 v0096910000
Lower line: Glasgow, Glasgow University Library, Hunter 307 (U.7.1), ff. 165v-66r. "A physician behooveth to know three manner inspections in bloodletting that is to say...." VK 0659.00; eVK2 v0034490000.

DIV1.P:
A phisiciane bihoueþ to knowe þre manerʼ inspecciouns in blode lettyng
A phicisian behoueþ to knowe þre manere inspecciouns in blod letyng

þat is to sey wheþer it be þicke or þynne or mene whil a man blediþ .
þat is to seie wheþer it be þicke or þinne or meene whil a man blediþ

Blode þat is þicke vnneþe goynge fro þe veyn but fallynge droppemele
¶ Blod þat is þicke vnneþe goyng fro þe veyne but fallyng dropmeel

it is euyl for it bytokneþ þe moisture of þe body to be wastid
it is euyl for it bitokneþ þe moisture of þe body to be waastid

¶ Blode þat is þynne & watrie youȝþouȝ
¶ Blod þat is þynne & watry þouȝ

it be leyde on þe nayle it wille not engele nor crodde
it be leid on þe naile it wole not engele ne crudde

þan it is euyll for it is bytokneþ þat
þan it is euyl for it bitokneþ þat

rawe humours ben to habundaunt in þe bodye or
rawe humours ben to abundaunt in þe body or

to mych moisture .
to moche moisture

Blode þat is mene or mesurable
¶ Blod þat is meene or mesurable

þat is bytwix þicke & þynne is preisable .
þat is betwene þicke or þynne is preisable

Also in þe bledynge men shall beholde wheþer it be hote or colde
¶ Also in þe bledyng me schal byholde wheþer it be hoot or cold.

for hote blode bytokneþ hote humours
for hoot blod bitokneþ hote humours

to haue þe moisture in þe body & cold
to haue þe maistrye in þe body & cold

¶ When it is engeled men shal beholde
¶ Whan it engeliþ me schal biholde

wheþer it be harsshe or crassynge or checkynge ?cherkynge
wheþer it be harsch or crassyng or cherkyng

¶ for if it be so it bytokneþ mych corrupcioun
¶ for if it be so it bitokneþ moche corrupcioun

in þe bodye or disposynge to lepre .
in þe body or disposyng to lepre

and if it be fatty it bytokneþ ouer mych fattenesse .
¶ Also if it be fatty it bitokneþ ouer moche fatnesse

Also if þe smelle of þe blode be stynkynge
¶ Also if þe smel of þe blod be stynkyng

it betokneþ corrupcioun of humours .
it bitokneþ corrupcioun of humour

or rotennesse in þe body
or rootnesse in þe body

¶ To knowe þe smel þer of wete a cloþe
To knowe þe smel þerof. wete a cloþ

þer in & ley to þi nose
þerin & lei to þi nose

Mich watrynesse in þe blode
Moche watrynesse in þe blod

bytokneþ moistnes
bitokneþ moysture

but lytil watrynesse bytokneþ drienesse
but litil watrynesse bitokneþ drienesse

¶ But þis watrynesse in þe blode
but þis watrynesse in þe blood

if it be gode it is like þe vryn
if it be good it is liyk þe vryn

of hym þat owiþ þe blode
of him þat owiþ þe blood

¶ Now after þe engelynge men shal byholde
¶ Now aftir þe engelyng me schal biholde

if it be skummyng for if it be so
if it be skummyng for if it be so

& it be not alonge
& it be not along

on þe hastynesse of fallynge
on þe hastynesse of fallyng

it bytokneþ þe blode to be vndefyed
it bitokneþ þe blod to be vndefyed

¶ Also þe ouer party of þe blode
¶ Also þe ouer party of þe blod

oweþ to be rede & pleyn or euen
owiþ to be reed & pleyn or euen

and a parti clerʼ for if it be not euene
and a party cleer for if it be not euene

& if it be not alonge on þe teldyng
and if it be not along on þe teeldyng

of þe vessel it bytokneþ greuance in þe
of þe vessel it bitokneþ greuaunce in þe

body of partyes
body of partyes

¶ Also if ony oþer colour þan rody or rede
¶ Also if ony oþer colour þan rody or reed

appere in þe ouer partie it bytokneþ corrupcioun
apere in þe ouer party it bitokneþ corrupcioun

¶ yelowe blode bytokneþ abundaunce of colre
¶ ȝelewe blod bitokneþ abundaunce of colre

pale blode bytokneþ habundaunce of fleume
¶ pale blod bitokneþ abundaunce of flewme

if it be þicke .
if it be þicke

& if it be þynne it bytokneþ malencolye
and if it be þynne it bitokneþ malencolie

¶ Blode þat nyȝeþ grenesse
¶ Blod þat nyȝeþ greenesse

bytokneþ for brennynge of þe bodye
bitokneþ for brennyng in þe body

And if it be nyȝ to blackenesse
and if it be neiȝe to blaknesse

it bytokneþ more brennynge or mortefyinge
it bitokneþ more brennyng or mortefiyng

¶ Blode þat is skkummynge
blod þat is skummyng

bytokneþ swellynge of humours in þe body
bitokneþ wellyng of humours in þe body

& burbly blode bytokneþ wyndynesse .
and burbly blod bitokneþ wyndynesse

watry blode bytokneþ coldenesse of þe lyuer
¶ Watry blod bitokneþ coldnesse of þe lyuer

If þe blode after þe puttynge of blode water
If þe blod aftir þe puttyng of blod water

is brotil & esy to sundre
is brotil and esy to sundre

it bytokneþ mych dryenesse
it bitokneþ moche drienesse

and if it be touȝ it bytokneþ
and if it be touȝ it bitokneþ

quesye & viscous humours
quesy & viscouse humours
